Package Controller

package Controller
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    AppointmentAddController
    The AppointmentAddController class is responsible for managing the functionalities associated with adding a new appointment.
    AppointmentController
    The AppointmentController class handles the CRUD operations for Appointments and manages the display and behavior of the appointments UI.
    AppointmentUpdateController
    Controller for updating appointments.
    CustomerAddController
    This class serves as a controller for the Add Customer screen.
    CustomerController
    Controller for managing customer records.
    CustomerUpdateController
    The CustomerUpdateController class provides methods and event handlers to manage the updating of customer records.
    LoginController
    The LoginController class provides methods to handle user login actions, log login attempts, and adjust the locale based on the system's settings.
    MainScreenController
    This class provides the controller for the main screen of the application.
    ReportController
    The ReportController class manages and controls the report view for the application.
